testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.text1: I highly recommend working with Sergey. All tasks were completed efficiently and on time. He also made improvements to the code, SEO, and overall website performance.
testimonials.text2: I am very satisfied with the result! The main goal was achieved – clean code with WordPress integration.
testimonials.text3: Great work! The task was completed on time, all corrections and requests were implemented. Highly recommended.
testimonials.text4: Sergey did an excellent job. The project was completed with high quality and within the agreed timeframe. All feedback was implemented. I recommend hiring him.

contact.title: Contact
